vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for (1) RR Regional Retail District; and (2) a resolution accepting the termination of deed restrictions [Z034-280] on property zoned MU-1 Mixed Use District, on the south corner of Ferguson Road and Little Pocket Road 
Recommendation of Staff:  Denial of (1) RR Regional District; and (2) approval of termination of deed restrictions [Z034-280]
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval of (1) RR Regional District; and (2) approval of termination of deed restrictions [Z034-280]
Z245-214(LG) / Z-25-000001
Note: This item was deferred by Councilmember Adam Bazaldua on November 12, 2025.

*In alignment with ForwardDallas.
